author: Annie Colbert
title: UK police dye blue lagoon black to ward off pesky influencers who should be staying home
description: If you dye it, they will not come. Police in Buxton, England found a clever way to prevent would-be influencers from flocking to the town's Instagrammable Caribbean-blue quarry lake — they dumped buckets of black dye in the water and called it a day. Accordin…
content:
If you dye it, they will not come.
Police in Buxton, England found a clever way to prevent would-be influencers from flocking to the town's Instagrammable Caribbean-blue quarry lake they dumped buckets of black dye in the water and called it a day.
